statement.p: Explain why the vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} 4 \\ -3 \\ -1 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ 4 \\ 0 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ -5 \\ -1 \\ -5 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -5 \\ 20 \\ 6 \\ 29 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ 3 \\ 3 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] span or don't span \mathbb{R}^4.
